title: broken beat, syncopated rhythm
caption: broken beat, syncopated rhythms, off-beat accents, nu-jazz influenced, shuffled grooves, underground club
lyrics:
I didn’t mean to drift away
I just didn’t know what to say

I stayed quiet longer than I planned
Some things slipped right through my hands

I’m still standing where I was
Trying to remember who I am

I’m not broken, I’m just tired
From carrying this for too long
